name: (Un)Controlled Shooter
description:
(Un)Controlled Shooter

A Short Shoot 'em up about defeating the aliens with your uncontrollable space ship. 

A Small game made in 72 hours for the Mini Jam 74: Chaos, with the limitation of only using the A, X, B, P, 8 button and the Space bar.

Gameplay

You're on a mission to stop the alien invasion!...but your controls are all messed up because of some poor ship maintenance.

Don't get hit too much or an error could pop up, changing your inputs!

Controls

For this game you use A, X, B, P and Space bar.

What button does what? Who knows.
